metadata.description: Elvis would be 80 years young this February, but Spellvis is still alive and kickin'. This soulful-singin' sorceror has been a hunka hunka burnin' thorn in Gina Diggers' side more than once. Maybe the last time you saw him, he was singin' some jailhouse rock, but he ain't about ta take a walk down Lonely Street just yet! Let th' King o' Rock 'n' Roll Magic show you just why you should fear and respect th' comin' o' his cold Kentucky reign!
metadata.name: Gold Digger: Spellvis - Return of the King Special
